title: SET_VEHICLE_XENON_LIGHTS_CUSTOM_COLOR
content:
0x1683E7F0// SetVehicleXenonLightsCustomColor
void SET_VEHICLE_XENON_LIGHTS_CUSTOM_COLOR(Vehicle vehicle, int red, int green, int blue);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle handle.red: Red color (0-255).green: Green color (0-255).blue: Blue color (0-255).Sets custom vehicle xenon lights color, allowing to use RGB palette. The game will ignore lights color set by _SET_VEHICLE_XENON_LIGHTS_COLOR when custom color is active. This native is not synced between players. Requires xenon lights mod to be set on vehicle.Examples:Lualocal vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsUsing(PlayerPedId())
if DoesEntityExist(vehicle) then
  -- Toggle xenon lights mod.
  ToggleVehicleMod(vehicle, 22, true)

  -- Set pink lights color.
  SetVehicleXenonLightsCustomColor(vehicle, 244, 5, 82)
end
codeBlocks:
// SetVehicleXenonLightsCustomColor
void SET_VEHICLE_XENON_LIGHTS_CUSTOM_COLOR(Vehicle vehicle, int red, int green, int blue);

local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsUsing(PlayerPedId())
if DoesEntityExist(vehicle) then
  -- Toggle xenon lights mod.
  ToggleVehicleMod(vehicle, 22, true)

  -- Set pink lights color.
  SetVehicleXenonLightsCustomColor(vehicle, 244, 5, 82)
end
